description: Complete system overview documenting the three-part architecture (Python pipeline, Go-based search swarm, and Clojure-based synthesis) with component interactions and high-level data flow
Detailed documentation of the semantic mode pipeline, including the runner's orchestration logic, stage sequencing, and artifact generation process
Technical documentation of the two-stage search process, domain anchor inference, and result aggregation algorithms implemented in the Go search swarm
Comprehensive documentation of the semantic synthesis algorithms, including skill inference, skill card generation, and mode merging logic implemented in Clojure
Detailed documentation of core data structures including ParsedMode, skill cards, semantic maps, and the relationships between these models across all three language implementations
